response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value to us at $1,500,000. Given its significance and the potential it holds for you, I am extending this exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the chance to secure this product at an exceptional price of $1,200,000. This offer not only represents a substantial savings but also reflects our commitment to making such exceptional quality and value accessible to discerning buyers like yourself. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any further information.", "product_price": 1200000}
